types.name: String
types.description: Represents textual data as UTF-8 character sequences. This type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

args.name: first
args.description: Truncate the array result to this size

args.name: maxWidth
args.description: Image width in pixels between 1 and 2048

args.name: maxHeight
args.description: Image width in pixels between 1 and 2048

args.name: crop
args.description: If specified, crop the image keeping the specified region

args.name: scale
args.description: Image size multiplier retina displays. Must be between 1 and 3

args.name: first
args.description: Truncate the array result to this size

types.name: Int
types.description: Represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: CropRegion
types.description: The part of the image that should remain after cropping

enumValues.name: CENTER
enumValues.description: Keep the center of the image

enumValues.name: TOP
enumValues.description: Keep the top of the image

enumValues.name: BOTTOM
enumValues.description: Keep the bottom of the image

types.name: CollectionSortKeys
types.description: The set of valid sort keys for the collections query.

types.name: ProductSortKeys
types.description: The set of valid sort keys for the products query.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: The mutation root of this schema

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The query root of this schema

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: The subscription root of this schema

types.name: __Type
types.description: A type in the GraphQL schema

fields.name: fields
fields.description: List of fields on this object

fields.name: ofType
fields.description: The modified type of this type

fields.name: possibleTypes
fields.description: Types which compose this Union or Interface

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: The kinds of types in this GraphQL system

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for accessing this field

fields.name: type
fields.description: The return type of this field

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: An input for a field or InputObject

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: The value applied if no other value is provided

fields.name: description
fields.description: What this value is used for

fields.name: type
fields.description: The expected type for this value

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: A possible value for an Enum

types.name: __Directive
types.description: A query directive in this schema

fields.name: onField
fields.description: Does this directive apply to fields?

fields.name: onFragment
fields.description: Does this directive apply to fragments?

fields.name: onOperation
fields.description: Does this directive apply to operations?

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: Parts of the query where a directive may be located

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Ignore this part of the query if `if` is true

directives.name: include
directives.description: Include this part of the query if `if` is true
